mapper.select: SELECT A.STUDYGROUP_ID , A.STUDYGROUP_TYPE , A.STUDYGROUP_CREATE_DATE , A.STUDYGROUP_MEMBER_COUNT , A.STUDYGROUP_ACTIVATION_STATUS , A.STUDYGROUP_STUDY_TIME , A.STUDYGROUP_CONTENT , A.STUDYGROUP_DELETE_STATUS FROM STUDYGROUP A;

SELECT A.STUDYGROUP_ID , A.STUDYGROUP_TYPE , A.STUDYGROUP_CREATE_DATE , A.STUDYGROUP_MEMBER_COUNT , A.STUDYGROUP_ACTIVATION_STATUS , A.STUDYGROUP_STUDY_TIME , A.STUDYGROUP_CONTENT , A.STUDYGROUP_DELETE_STATUS FROM STUDYGROUP A WHERE STUDYGROUP_TYPE = '영어 시험 스터디';

SELECT A.STUDYGROUP_ID , A.STUDYGROUP_TYPE , A.STUDYGROUP_CREATE_DATE , A.STUDYGROUP_MEMBER_COUNT , A.STUDYGROUP_ACTIVATION_STATUS , A.STUDYGROUP_STUDY_TIME , A.STUDYGROUP_CONTENT , A.STUDYGROUP_DELETE_STATUS FROM STUDYGROUP A WHERE STUDYGROUP_TYPE = '국가 자격증 스터디';

SELECT A.STUDYGROUP_ID , A.STUDYGROUP_TYPE , A.STUDYGROUP_CREATE_DATE , A.STUDYGROUP_MEMBER_COUNT , A.STUDYGROUP_ACTIVATION_STATUS , A.STUDYGROUP_STUDY_TIME , A.STUDYGROUP_CONTENT , A.STUDYGROUP_DELETE_STATUS FROM STUDYGROUP A WHERE STUDYGROUP_ACTIVATION_STATUS = #{activationStatus};

SELECT STUDYGROUP_ID , STUDYGROUP_TYPE , STUDYGROUP_CREATE_DATE , STUDYGROUP_MEMBER_COUNT , STUDYGROUP_ACTIVATION_STATUS , STUDYGROUP_STUDY_TIME , STUDYGROUP_CONTENT , STUDYGROUP_DELETE_STATUS FROM STUDYGROUP WHERE STUDYGROUP_TYPE = #{studygroup_type};

SELECT A.STUDYGROUP_ID , A.STUDYGROUP_TYPE , A.STUDYGROUP_CREATE_DATE , A.STUDYGROUP_MEMBER_COUNT , A.STUDYGROUP_ACTIVATION_STATUS , A.STUDYGROUP_STUDY_TIME , A.STUDYGROUP_CONTENT , A.STUDYGROUP_DELETE_STATUS , B.STUDYGROUP_MEMBER_ID , B.STUDYGROUP_ID , B.STUDYGROUP_ROLE , B.STUDYGROUP_REGIST_DATE , B.USER_CODE FROM STUDYGROUP A JOIN STUDYGROUP_MEMBER B ON (A.STUDYGROUP_ID = B.STUDYGROUP_ID) WHERE B.USER_CODE = #{userCode}
